title: Euryelos
description: A fortress built by Dionysius the Elder 9 km west of Syracuse

properties.description: 1:500,000 scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 19118

properties.description: Location of the modern hamlet of Belvedere (municipality of Siracusa), where the ancient fortress of Euryelos used to be, based on a representative point derived from an OpenStreetMap node.
properties.title: Belvedere
